name: Phantom Brave
description:
Phantom Brave is a strategy game developed by Nippon Ichi Software. It was originally released in 2004. Phantom Brave has a Metascore of 73, based on professional reviews.
You can play Phantom Brave on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Haru Akenaga and Sōhei Niikawa. Shinichi Ikeda, Takeshi Hasegawa and Yoshitsuna Kobayashi directed the game. It was scored by Tenpei Sato.
